main.name: Daniel Korsmeier
main.description: I like playing around with Python, but other programming languages and frameworks are better for serious software. I have already been involved in several small software and other projects and have been able to manage some of them myself.
main.bio: My name is Daniel Korsmeier, I am 28 years old and currently about to finish my business informatics studies. My hobbies are reading, gaming and social networking. I would like to work in a mixture of project management, software development and consulting, because I think this is very exciting.
main.contactmessage: The best way to reach me is via e-mail

resume.skillmessage: I like developing and project management in the general IT area.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
